items.content_html: Layouter is a lightweight React utility for creating responsive masonry-style layouts. It distributes items across 1–4 columns based on their height and supports custom render logic, with optional getId and getHeight accessors for flexible integration.
items.title: HassanMostafaa/react-broken-layouter: Layouter is a lightweight React utility for creating responsive masonry-style layouts. It distributes items across 1–4 columns based on their height and supports custom render logic, with optional getId and getHeight accessors for flexible integration.
